resources.name: /analyze-code
resources.description: Reviews code structure and identifies key components, mapping relationships between elements and suggesting targeted improvements for better architecture and performance.
resources.author: Hkgstax

resources.name: /clean
resources.description: Addresses code formatting and quality issues by fixing black formatting problems, organizing imports with isort, resolving flake8 linting issues, and correcting mypy type errors.
resources.author: Graphlet-AI

resources.name: /implement-issue
resources.description: Implements GitHub issues following strict project guidelines, complete implementation checklists, variable naming conventions, testing procedures, and documentation requirements.
resources.author: cmxela

resources.name: /implement-task
resources.description: Approaches task implementation methodically by thinking through strategy step-by-step, evaluating different approaches, considering tradeoffs, and implementing the best solution.
resources.author: Hkgstax

resources.name: /task-breakdown
resources.description: Analyzes feature requirements, identifies components and dependencies, creates manageable tasks, and sets priorities for efficient feature implementation.
resources.author: Hkgstax

resources.name: /tdd-implement
resources.description: Implements Test-Driven Development by analyzing feature requirements, creating tests first (red), implementing minimal passing code (green), and refactoring while maintaining tests.
resources.author: jerseycheese

resources.name: /testing_plan_integration
resources.description: Creates inline Rust-style tests, suggests refactoring for testability, analyzes code challenges, and creates comprehensive test coverage for robust code.
resources.author: buster-so
